author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds explicit manipulation of `HLTSchedule` when the Paths whose customization was added in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/35566 are replaced in `ProcessFragment`. Fixes https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/35624.

#### PR validation:

Tested on CPU-only machine that workflow 11634.502 works.
title: Fix customisePixelLocalReconstruction() customize function
